forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 66F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
